insert into tb_post (post_id, movie_id, user_id,post_title, content,star_rate, view_count,comment_count,create_at,update_at)
VALUES (POST_SEQ.nextval, #{movie_id} , #{user_id}, #{post_title}, #{content}, #{star_rate}, #{view_count}, #{comment_count}, #{create_at, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{update_at, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: UPDATE Tb_Post SET view_count = view_count + 1 WHERE post_id = #{post_id}
